textBeforeTable: Adobe Systems Inc's Total Liabilities for the fiscal year that ended in Nov. 2014 is calculated as Total liabilities are the liabilities that the company has to pay others. It is a part of the balance sheet of a company that shareholders do not own, and would be obligated to pay back if the company liquidated. Definition Adobe Systems Inc's annual total liabilities increased from Nov. 2012 ($3,375.05 Mil) to Nov. 2013 ($3,655.66 Mil) and increased from Nov. 2013 ($3,655.66 Mil) to Nov. 2014 ($4,009.92 Mil).
